name: No Man's Ska
description:
Hey you! If you come in off the galaxy, you better start to move your ship to the rockinest beat of space! 'cause this is No Man's Ska!

Rules: Press Space and keep the beat!

F or F11 to toggle fullscreen, ESC to quit.

This game was made for the Micro Fangame Jam 2.

Assets

No Man's Sky logo
Stars Parallax Background - Bonsaiheldin | http://bonsaiheld.org
Fluffy Clouds - dbenoy | https://opengameart.org/content/fluffy-clouds
Bebop sprite - Cowboy Bebop
Doggy Dog III - Seatbelts
